ftAssocReqDirect Struct Reference
[Route Under Mac (RUM)]

#include <mac.h>

Detailed Description

Direct association request frame, sent by a new node trying to join the nework, to a coordinator/router that sent a beacon frame.

Definition at line 564 of file mac.h.
